snippet: Wimbledon champion Andy Murray will miss Britain's Davis Cup quarter-final clash against Serbia with captain Leon Smith naming Kyle Edmund and James Ward as his two singles players on Wednesday....
lead_paragraph: Wimbledon champion Andy Murray will miss Britain's Davis Cup quarter-final clash against Serbia with captain Leon Smith naming Kyle Edmund and James Ward as his two singles players on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Murray to Miss Britain's Davis Cup Quarter-Final
headline.main: Murray to Miss Britain's Davis Cup Quarter-Final
